WorkItem.Description:
I'm getting a "Security Error" whenever I try to load a character from battle.net.
 
I have tried reinstalling Silverlight, reinstalling Rawr, and running Rawr from the web plugin, receiving the same error each time.
 
Error text:
 
Error Message:
Security error.
 
Suggested Fix:
No Suggested Fix
 
Troubleshooting:
You can also check the Troubleshooting Guide for more steps on getting Rawr to run smoothly. http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Troubleshooting
 
Instructions:
If you still have this problem after performing the suggested fix, please copy and paste this into a new ticket in the Issue Tracker. Thanks!
